Name: children
Desc: Gets the children of each element in the set of matched elements.
Long Desc: Gets the children of each element in the set of matched elements. Returns all direct child nodes as an array. Optionally accepts a selector to filter the children by a specific criteria.
Example:
Q(selector).children(); // Returns all direct children
Q(selector).children('.specific-class'); // Returns children with the specified class
Q(selector).children('[data-attribute="value"]'); // Returns children with the specified attribute
